ai-patthana23.6:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.6:1.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in someone who isn’t sustained by rapture, happiness arises in him. Grounded on the teaching, and there is no cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.6:2.1_0: Not skilled in the teaching, nor doing what is unskillful and blameless, because of happiness arises in him as a reason.
ai-patthana23.6:3.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in someone who isn’t skilled in equanimity, or cause or reasoned by equanimity.
